description:
If the placement service (as of microversion 1.10) if you request a microversion that is outside the acceptable range of VERSIONS and do _not_ include an 'Accept' header in the request, there is a 500 and a KeyError while webob tries to look up the Accept header.

The issue is in FaultWrapper, so the problem can be dealt with elsewhere in placement WSGI stack.
title: Requesting an out of range microversion without an accept header in placement results in a KeyError

comments.content:
If the placement service (as of microversion 1.10) if you request a microversion that is outside the acceptable range of VERSIONS and do _not_ include an 'Accept' header in the request, there is a 500 and a KeyError while webob tries to look up the Accept header.

The issue is in FaultWrapper, so the problem can be dealt with elsewhere in placement WSGI stack.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~cdent
